server

Class ReiseServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.ReiseServer

  • public class ReiseServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides the server functionality it allows clients to connect and ask for bookings, free places and provided traveling destinations.
    Author:
    erik

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReiseServer(int port)
      Creates a new ServerSocket and makes multiple client access possible with threads.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bucheReise(java.net.Socket client, java.lang.String reiseziel, int anzahl)
      Contains the server part of the booking protocol written for the communication with the ReiseClient

      1: The method checks if it provides a journey matching to the reiseziel.
      2: The method checks the matching journey has enough space for the amount of persons who want to book this journey.
      3: The method answerers the client over an outputstream if the booking request is OK (journey exists and enough space).
      4: If the request was ok the Client now sends the names of the individual travelers.
      5: The Server tries to add every traveler to the desired Reise if everything works the ReiseServer will answer posetive.
      int getFreiePlaetze(java.lang.String reiseziel)
      Gets free places in a Reise object.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReiseServer

        public ReiseServer(int port)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new ServerSocket and makes multiple client access possible with threads. In the contained overwritten run method the Constructor will check what the ReiseClient wants to do. Multiple requests are possible. The run method simply does one thing after the other, untill the client sends "clientIsGoingDown" what causes the end of the connection.
        Parameters:
        port - an Integer that stands for the Port the Server will be available at (don´t forget to configure your firewall).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • getFreiePlaetze

        public int getFreiePlaetze(java.lang.String reiseziel)
        Gets free places in a Reise object.
        (Is only out sourced code from ReiseServer.ReiseServer(int port).
        Parameters:
        reiseziel - a String that is used to find a inherent Reise.
        Returns:
        an Integer that represents the amount of avilable places in the Reise object that matches to reiseziel.

      • bucheReise

        public void bucheReise(java.net.Socket client,
              java.lang.String reiseziel,
              int anzahl)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Contains the server part of the booking protocol written for the communication with the ReiseClient

        1: The method checks if it provides a journey matching to the reiseziel.
        2: The method checks the matching journey has enough space for the amount of persons who want to book this journey.
        3: The method answerers the client over an outputstream if the booking request is OK (journey exists and enough space).
        4: If the request was ok the Client now sends the names of the individual travelers.
        5: The Server tries to add every traveler to the desired Reise if everything works the ReiseServer will answer posetive.
        Parameters:
        client - a Socket that is used to communicate with the client.
        reiseziel - a String that represents the travel destination the booking is about.
        anzahl - an Integer that represents the number of future travelers who want to book.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
